document.full_text: linkedin's ipo has opened, and, as expected, it's boffo -- shares are up 90% to $83.20, and the company is worth more than $8 billion.
document.title: linkedin shares surge, but hold off ... for now
lines_and_colors: linkedin's ipo has opened, and, as expected, it's boffo -- shares are up 90% to $83.20, and the company is worth more than $8 billion.
